General.Name: Multi Prima Sejahtera Tbk
General.Description: PT Multi Prima Sejahtera Tbk produces, distributes, and sells spark plugs and motor vehicle accessory spare parts in Indonesia and internationally. It offers spark plugs for motorcycle and four-wheeled vehicles under the Champion brand. The company distributes auto lamps, cooking oils, motors, and others. In addition, it trades in machinery, equipment, and other paraphernalia. Further, the company engages in plant farming and plant breeding, as well as professional, scientific, and technical related activities. PT Multi Prima Sejahtera Tbk was founded in 1982 and is headquartered in Tangerang, Indonesia. The company operates as a subsidiary of PT Multipolar Tbk.
